mapper.insert: insert into app_hos_photo(hos_no, pho_name, pho_filename, pho_type) values( #{hospitalNo}, #{hosPhotoUrl}, #{hosPhotoFilename}, #{hosPhotoType})
mapper.select: select pho_name, pho_filename, pho_type, hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno from app_hos_photo p inner join app_hospital h on p.hos_no = h.hos_no order by pho_no desc
select pho_name, pho_filename, pho_type, hos_name, hos_addr, hos_tel, hos_time, hos_sub, hos_busno from app_hos_photo p inner join app_hospital h on p.hos_no = h.hos_no where pho_no=#{no}
select hos_no, pho_no, pho_name, pho_filename, pho_type from app_hos_photo where hos_no=#{no}
